name: Gachacity
description:
A Gachapon simulator where you roam around a city, scavenging for coins to buy capsule toys and pay rent at the end of the week. Please have fun with my second game for the Quest 2 platform. 


Extract using Winrar/7Z and install the APK using Sidequest or whatever APK loader you use. It was fun cramming this many objects in under a 1GB archived file!
